caption:
“The Cross is the compass of the soul.”

Reflection:
When lost, look to the Cross — it points toward love through suffering, and truth through trial.

Commentary:
This metaphor teaches that the Cross guides our direction. It orients life toward sacrifice, humility, and redemption.
